alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Aiken County through 715 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple strong thunderstorms near Aiken Municipal Airport, or 8 miles northeast of Aiken, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Aiken Mall, New Ellenton, USC Aiken, Citizens Park, Aiken Municipal Airport, Gloverville, Aiken State Park, Graniteville, Burnettown, Windsor, Hopeland Gardens, Vaucluse, New Holland and Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 8 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
